mapper.insert: insert into user_tbl(user_id, user_password, user_name, user_email, user_zipcode, user_addr, user_deaddr, user_phone) value (#{user_id}, #{user_password}, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_zipcode}, #{user_addr}, #{user_deaddr}, #{user_phone})
mapper.select: select user_id from user_tbl where user_id = #{user_id}
